entry.title: CVE-2025-33053 Exploit via Malicious .URL File and WebDAV
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： CVE-2025-33053 Exploit via Malicious .URL File and WebDAV

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-33053

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 该模块通过生成恶意的.URL文件来利用CVE-2025-33053，该文件指向一个受信任的LOLBAS二进制文件，其参数设计用于触发意外行为。可选地，生成一个有效载荷并将其托管在指定的WebDAV目录上。当受害者打开快捷方式时，它将尝试访问WebDAV路径，可能导致通过受信任的二进制文件实现远程代码执行。

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/439abc87cab199bc4d1300d5b0a173216d0ccb0c/modules%2Fexploits%2Fwindows%2Ffileformat%2Fcve_2025_33053.rb

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

POC详情

漏洞名称： CVE-2025-33053 Exploit via Malicious .U

entry.title: VMware ESXi & Horizon DaaS OpenSLP 缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： VMware ESXi & Horizon DaaS OpenSLP 缓冲区溢出漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-5544

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： ESXi和Horizon DaaS设备中的OpenSLP组件存在堆溢出漏洞，远程攻击者可以利用此漏洞执行任意代码，攻击需要网络访问权限。

产品厂商： VMware

产品名称： ESXi & Horizon DaaS

搜索语法： http.title:”horizon daas”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12406

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

OpenSLP in ESXi and Horizon DaaS appliances contains a heap overwrite caused by a vulnerability in the OpenSLP component, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires network access.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/51f10d5e647f
  • https://github.com/dgh05t/VMware_ESXI_OpenSLP_PoCs
  • https///github.com:dgh05t/VMware_ESXI_OpenSLP_PoCs.git
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/8a8375ae7774
  • https://github.com/HynekPetrak/CVE-2019-5544_CVE-2020-3992
  • https///github.com:HynekPetrak/CVE-2019-5544_CVE-2020-3992.git

KEV: True

Shodan Query: http.title:"horizon daas"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： VMware ESXi & Horizon DaaS OpenSLP

entry.title: Ultimate Addons for Contact Form 7 文件上传漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Ultimate Addons for Contact Form 7 文件上传漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-6220

漏洞类型： 文件上传

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Ultimate Addons for Contact Form 7插件在其选项保存功能中未对文件类型进行适当的验证，允许管理员或更高级别的用户上传任意文件，从而可能在服务器上获得代码执行权限。

产品厂商： Ultimate Addons for Contact Form 7

产品名称： Ultimate Addons for Contact Form 7

影响版本： <= 3.5.12

来源： https://github.com/d0n601/CVE-2025-6220

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • CVE-2025-6220.py
  • README.md
  • images

来源概述

Ultimate Addons for Contact Form 7 <= 3.5.12 - Authenticated (Administrator+) Arbitrary File Upload via ‘save_options’

The Ultimate Addons for Contact Form 7 plugin does not sanitize the file types in its options save functionality, allowing administrators or above to upload arbitrary files and potentially gain code execution on the server.

TL;DR Exploits

  • A POC CVE-2025-6220.py is provided to demonstrate an administrator uploading a web shell named shell.php.

Details

The uacf7_options_save functionality in /wp-content/plugins/ultimate-addons-for-contact-form-7/admin/tf-options/classes/UACF7_Settings.php processes file uploads without enforcing proper file type validation.

Lines 894-920 of the save_options() function check the HTTP request for $_FILES and only validates the MIME type against a generic application/octet-stream. It will then store the file in a web accessible directory /wp-content/uploads/itinerary-fonts.

Manual Reproduction

  1. Login to the admin panel and navigate to Ultimate Addons -> Settings.
  2. Start up Burp Suite or a similar tool and begin intercepting the traffic.
  3. Click the Save button in the lower right hand corner.
  4. Intercept the POST request in Burp, and append your own file data (ensure you use the correct form boundaries).

  1. Forward the request and verify the response indicates success:
  1. Navigate to https://lab1.hacker/wp-content/uploads/itinerary-fonts/shell.php to execute the proof of concept.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Ultimate Addons for Contact Form 7 文件上传

entry.title: Fortinet SSL-VPN 堆缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Fortinet SSL-VPN 堆缓冲区溢出漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2022-42475

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Fortinet SSL-VPN中存在一个堆缓冲区溢出漏洞（CWE-122），影响FortiOS（版本7.2.0至7.2.2、7.0.0至7.0.8、6.4.0至6.4.10、6.2.0至6.2.11、6.0.15及更早版本）和FortiProxy SSL-VPN（版本7.2.0至7.2.1、7.0.7及更早版本）。远程未认证攻击者可通过特制请求利用此漏洞执行任意代码或命令。

产品厂商： fortinet

产品名称： FortiOS, FortiProxy

影响版本： FortiOS 7.2.0 <= version <= 7.2.2, 7.0.0 <= version <= 7.0.8, 6.4.0 <= version <= 6.4.10, 6.2.0 <= version <= 6.2.11, version <= 6.0.15; FortiProxy 7.2.0 <= version <= 7.2.1, version <= 7.0.7

搜索语法： port:10443 http.favicon.hash:945408572, cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:fortinet:fortios”, http.html:”/remote/login” “xxxxxxxx”

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情

entry.title: Fastjson 反序列化远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Fastjson 反序列化远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2017-18349

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Fastjson在1.2.25之前的版本中，parseObject方法存在远程代码执行漏洞。攻击者可以通过精心构造的JSON请求，利用恶意的@type注解触发JdbcRowSetImpl的不安全反序列化，从而执行任意代码。此漏洞影响Pippo 1.11.0中的FastjsonEngine以及其他使用易受攻击Fastjson版本的产品。成功利用此漏洞可能导致系统完全被攻陷，攻击者可以执行任意命令、访问敏感数据并在目标系统上建立持久后门。

产品厂商： alibaba

产品名称： fastjson

影响版本： version < 1.2.25

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/273970a87fd4961990cf390639c9db173092d040/http%2Fcves%2F2017%2FCVE-2017-18349.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Fastjson 反序列化远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞

entry.title: Fastjson 反序列化漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Fastjson 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2017-18349

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Fastjson在1.2.25之前的版本中存在反序列化漏洞，攻击者可以通过构造恶意的JSON数据，在parseObject中实现远程代码执行。利用此漏洞需要向/json端点发送恶意JSON负载。

产品厂商： Fastjson

产品名称： Fastjson

影响版本： version < 1.2.25

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12387

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Fastjson before 1.2.25 contains a remote code execution caused by unsafe deserialization in parseObject, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code via crafted JSON data, exploit requires sending malicious JSON payload to /json endpoint.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/pippo-java/pippo/issues/466
  • https://github.com/h0cksr/Fastjson--CVE-2017-18349-

KEV: True

Shodan Query: NA

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Fastjson 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

entry.title: Langflow Unauth RCE
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-rvqx-wpfh-mfx7

仓库 Star： 74752

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/langflow-ai/langflow/security/advisories/GHSA-rvqx-wpfh-mfx7

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-3248

  • https://github.com/langflow-ai/langflow/pull/6911

  • https://github.com/langflow-ai/langflow/commit/faac4db133de32fcb6d483fa9ff52f40ce42bdc0

  • https://github.com/langflow-ai/langflow/releases/tag/1.3.0

  • https://www.horizon3.ai/attack-research/disclosures/unsafe-at-any-speed-abusing-python-exec-for-unauth-rce-in-langflow-ai

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-rvqx-wpfh-mfx7

描述：

Langflow versions prior to 1.3.0 are susceptible to code injection in the /api/v1/validate/code endpoint. A remote and unauthenticated attacker can send crafted HTTP requests to execute arbitrary code.
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-rvqx-wpfh-mfx7

entry.title: Apache ActiveMQ Artemis Console Default Login Vulnerability

entry.title: GreatPages 子域名接管漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： GreatPages 子域名接管漏洞

漏洞类型： 未授权访问

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 检测到GreatPages.com.br上潜在的子域名接管漏洞，通过识别未认领页面上显示的默认错误消息。

产品厂商： GreatPages

产品名称： GreatPages

搜索语法： cname=”cname.greatpages.com.br”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/08476ddf1566a0d9ad61311d0fca3e89711402e6/http%2Ftakeovers%2Fgreatpages-takeover.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
